segments.text: Oh , it's getting late . I've got to run . It was nice talking to you , karren .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Tim . Nice meeting you , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess we'll see each other around .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I hope so . Well , take it easy .
segments.speaker: S2
